career.name: AR-Simply
career.title: Bachelor of Science (B.Sc) in Medialogy
description: Created a web application for AR-Simply, a company that specializes in augmented reality solutions.
The web application was designed to enhance user experience and provide interactive features.
The web application was built using modern web technologies, ensuring responsiveness and accessibility, such as React,Node.js,postgreSQL, and Tailwind CSS.
